welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kensington! This charming and historic neighborhood is known for its beautiful gardens, world-class museums, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Kensington has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and VIP flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights to Asia and the Americas.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights to Africa and the Middle East.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The third newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then chargeable for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mostly domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
